attributes.action: Enforce programs providing gainful employment including raising the minimum wage
attributes.background: Without wasting time, the minimum wage should be increased immediately to £7.81 an hour, Britain’s biggest trade union proves this, also arguing it would boost the economy as well as lift millions of low paid workers out of poverty.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to set the minimum wage at a particular rate; or to take particular action as regards employment programmes.

If you resubmit your petition, please provide us with a full name as we are not able to approve petitions without this information.
